name: American Truck Simulator - Forest Machinery
detailed_description:
Forest Machinery DLC is the next step in our series of heavy cargo expansions, which introduces machinery and equipment designed and designated for the hard-working people of the wood industry in American Truck Simulator.

Their unique jobs demands specialised trailers and accessories. These exclusive cargoes can be found within "woodworking" state territories like Oregon and Washington, but are also a part of the in-game economy across the USA. We did not forget to add something stylish for your cabin interior too!

Feature List



Towed Forest Machinery

  • Forwarder
  • Log Harvester
  • Log Loader
  • Log Stacker
  • Mulcher
  • Stumper

Specialized Trailers

  • Tub Grinder
  • Knuckleboom Loader

Truck Accessories

  • Headache Racks (2 versions for each cabin type)

Cabin Toy

  • Hanging Chainsaw toy

short_description: Forest Machinery DLC is the next step in our series of heavy cargo expansions, which introduces machinery and equipment designed and designated for the hard-working people of the wood industry in American Truck Simulator.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
